requirements: Prerequisites: ART 230 and one course from ART 331, 332, or 342, or with permission of instructor.
description:
A course for intermediate and advanced painting students exploring historical and contemporary issues in figurative painting including portraiture, narrative and history painting. Studio work is complemented by an in-depth study of the gaze, subjectivity, memory, and imagination. After guided assignments, ultimate emphasis will be on self-directed projects. May be taken more than once. Materials fee: $75 per term.
Prerequisites: ART 230 and one course from ART 331, 332, or 342, or with permission of instructor.
title: Painting Studio: The Narrative...
